thread.title: BRIEF-Therapix Biosciences Says U.S. FDA Cleared IND For THX-110 In Treatment Of Chronic Low Back Pain

title: BRIEF-Therapix Biosciences Says U.S. FDA Cleared IND For THX-110 In Treatment Of Chronic Low Back Pain

organizations.name: treatment of chronic low back pain reuters staff   therapix biosciences ltd

text: March 20, 2018 / 2:14 PM / Updated 29 minutes ago BRIEF-Therapix Biosciences Says U.S. FDA Cleared IND For THX-110 In Treatment Of Chronic Low Back Pain Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Therapix Biosciences Ltd: * THERAPIX BIOSCIENCES - U.S. FDA CLEARED IND FOR THX-110 IN TREATMENT OF CHRONIC LOW BACK PAIN * THERAPIX BIOSCIENCES - EXPECTS TO COMMENCE PHASE IIA CLINICAL TRIAL FOR CHRONIC LOW BACK PAIN DRUG DURING Q2 2018 Source text: ( bit.ly/2GMdJ8D ) Further company coverage:
